All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Bullet2Segments
Class used to creating additional segments for EnemyBullet2 object
CollisionRect
Contains rectangular collision mechanic
DesktopLauncher
Class that works as a desktop launcher of the game, required by LibGdx as a framework
EnemyBullet
Class contains information about bullet like speed, sprite and its behaviour
EnemyBullet1
Class contains information about bullet like speed, sprite and its behaviour
EnemyBullet2
Class contains information about bullet like speed, sprite and its behaviour
GameOverScreen
This class contains visualization of the game over screen, buttons and their behaviour, score and high score display, implements Screen.
Health
Class contains health mechanism, loading sprites and drawing position
MainGameScreen
This class contains visualization of the main game screen, player movement, score mechanic and is also responsible for the appearance of projectiles.
MainMenuScreen
This class contains visualization of the main menu screen, buttons and their behaviour, implements Screen.
Question
Class contains information about question.
QuestionContent
Class contains content of the question after player picks it up
SpaceCatch
Class that implements Game and is used as a first class after starting the game, sets creen to main menu screen Uses default constructor
